title: 4 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords: Workbook Low Competition High Demand #KDP #KDPKeywords

tactics.name: chrome_extension_analysis

steps: Install Tight Self-Publishing Titans and Amazon Scout Pro
Check keyword new score and total results
Analyze BSR, price, and review data

tactics.name: Target Specific CBT Niches
tactics.description: Focus on细分 markets like teens or adults with specific anxiety types to leverage low competition and high demand.

tactics.name: Enhance Content Value

heuristics.name: low_competition_filter
heuristics.condition: If total results are under 1000 and BSR under 300,000 then prioritize
source_quotes: total results are under 1000 which is ideal

heuristics.name: Prioritize High-Scoring Keywords
heuristics.condition: If keyword score > 70 and total results < 1000, prioritize for content creation

claims.statement: Amazon KDP allows non-medical therapeutic content with proper disclaimers
source_quotes: include disclaimer stating not a physician/therapist
